1.summary: How can I install everything and get started immediately?
1.details: Please visit the README.md file in my GitHub repository, where you'll always find the most current information about the project along with easy installation instructions.

2.summary: Why should I choose Blogy as my Next.js 14 starter?
2.details: The answer is simple: to prevent you from hopping between different starters. In fact, you can stop searching now. With Blogy, you are presented with unlimited possibilities. You can create anything you desire; all the necessary tools are already prepared, just for you.

3.summary: How long it takes to develop this starter?
3.details: Developing something as ambitious and complex as Next.js 14 obviously takes a lot of time, especially since the project is primarily developed by just one person.I'm working on it since January 2024 (3 months from now). I have already worked with the previous version of Next.js, so I had a good starting point, even so there are several changes in Next.js since then. I'm also using the latest technologies and best practices, so it's a time-consuming process.

login.metaDescription: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

signUp.metaDescription: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

home.metaDescription: Blogy is a simple web application using NextJs, it serves as a open source boilerplate for NextJs 14 applications.

dashboard.metaDescription: My personal space where I can access all my data and manage my account.

articles.metaDescription: Articles I have written with passion.

verifyAccount.metaDescription: Verify account by entering the code you received by email.

forgotPassword.metaDescription: Send forgot password request to email.

contact.metaDescription: Contact us for help, for information or for suggestion. {appName} service will be happy to help you.
